content: Dodge his multiple tail strikes and deflect his charging claw attacks to wait for opportunities to counter attack. Defeat him, and you'll gain the Scorpion Prince Spirit (as well as a **Deathstinger Soak**... in case you want to poison yourself on purpose), and can then harvest the **Luojia Fragrant Vine** on the large tree.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Middle Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Middle Hollow'.
The content is as follows:
Dodge his multiple tail strikes and deflect his charging claw attacks to wait for opportunities to counter attack. Defeat him, and you'll gain the Scorpion Prince Spirit (as well as a **Deathstinger Soak**... in case you want to poison yourself on purpose), and can then harvest the **Luojia Fragrant Vine** on the large tree.
